content: Multiple schools have dati.e-skola.lv as the website. But it seems like this portal doesn't work anymore and hasn't been for a while (archive).

Interesting that some api front/wrapper is still running: http://dati.e-skola.lv/Katalogs/RigaSkolaVisas (taken from here). That's obviously useless response, just funny that it's there after 5 years.
